sentences.en: A crowd of eager young students were already waiting outside.
sentences.cn: 一群急不可待的青年学生已经在外面等着。

sentences.en: Arty sneered at the crowd of eager faces around him.
sentences.cn: 阿蒂对他身边那些期盼的面孔嗤之以鼻。
体育场外急不可耐的观众

sentences.en: He is always eager for new experiences and ever-willing to experiment.
sentences.cn: 他总是渴望拥有新的经历，而且永远愿意尝试。

sentences.en: He sounded both pitiful and eager to get what he wanted.
sentences.cn: 他听起来既可怜兮兮的，又对想要的东西充满渴望。

sentences.en: He was eager to get into politics.
He was eager to match his knowledge against mine.
sentences.cn: 他很想和我比比,看谁的知识更丰富.

sentences.en: He was intensely eager, indeed avid, for wealth.
He’s a bright kid and eager to learn.
sentences.cn: 他是个聪明的孩子，热爱学习。

sentences.en: Her voice was girlish and eager.
sentences.cn: 她的声音像个小姑娘似的，而且带着一股急不可耐。

sentences.en: Parliamentarians were eager to turn over responsibility for the decision.
sentences.cn: 经验老到的议员急于把作决策的责任推卸给他人。

sentences.en: Robert was eager to talk about life in the Army.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特很想谈谈陆军生活。

sentences.en: She sounded less and less eager to return to Ireland.
sentences.cn: 听她话音，她回爱尔兰的热情似乎日渐消退。

sentences.en: She’s a very hard worker and very eager to please.
sentences.cn: 她工作很卖力，而且很希望别人满意。

sentences.en: The company is eager to gain a foothold in Europe.
sentences.cn: 这家公司急于在欧洲取得一席之地。

sentences.en: The engineer was an eager participant in technical co - operation.
sentences.cn: 那位工程师热心参与技术合作.

sentences.en: The head is eager that all the workers should come in time.
sentences.cn: 队长急着要所有工人都按时来.

sentences.en: Under stress these people will appear to be superficial, over-eager and manipulative.
sentences.cn: 这些人在压力下会显得浅薄无知、操之过急，而且爱摆布人。

trans.tran_en: very keen and excited about something that is going to happen or about something you want to do
